commit.message:
Brayns-257 migrate rockets entry points (#919)

* Fixed signed comparison warning.

* Fixed ArchiveLoader.

* Fixed Deflect plugin.

* Removed command line parsing from DeflectPlugin.

* Removed unused arguments warning.
Restored fromOSPRayProperties.

* Removed unused arguments warning.

* Fixed globals shadowing.

* Try to fix test plugin failure.

* Fixed error in plugin test.

* Basic entrypoint files added (not used for now).

* Entrypoints, JSON and messages implementation.

* Network manager basic implementation.

* Server WebSocket implemented (unstable).

* Minor improvements on network interface.

* Ensure websocket timeout is illimited (0).
(The disconnection came from the Python client)

* Cleanup network folder.

* Moved network files to network folder.

* Moved network manager in its own folder.

* JSON schema added (unstable).

* JsonSchema validation added.

* JSON handling improvements.

* Integer accepted when number required.

* Added bool return value to JSON serialization.

* New entrypoint interface.

* Fixed bug with JSON type validation.

* Notification and progress implemented.

* JsonSchema formatting improvements.

* Code cleanup.

* - Messages moved in messages folder.
- AnimationParameters entrypoint added.

* Added try-catch in notifications.

* Camera entrypoint added.

* Entrypoint ref management cleanup.

* Moved ImageGenerator to brayns core.

* ImageJpeg entrypoint added.

* Preparing stream entrypoints.

* Stream implementation preparation.

* Moved encoder from Rockets to brayns.

* Delayed request processing implemented.

* Renderer entrypoint added.

* Version entrypoint added.

* Application parameters entrypoint added.

* Volume parameters entrypoint added.

* JSON refactoring (unstable).

* Fixed empty JsonSchema bug.

* Tests and bugfixes.

* JSON refactoring + scene entrypoint preparation.

* Use property instance to create its schema.

* New adapter macros (Box migrated).

* Replaced additional messages by JSON adapters.

* Read and write only options added.

* Scene entrypoint added.

* Enum support improved.

* Added statistics entrypoint.

* Minor changes.

* Inspect entrypoint added.

* Quit entrypoint added.

* Exit later entrypoint added.

* Reset camera entrypoint added.

* Replaced imagebase64 message by adapter.

* - Moved snapshot task to code.
- JSON adapter improvements.
- Snapshot entrypoint stub.

* - Task system implemented.
- Connection system refactored.

* Snapshot entrypoint added.

* Preparing add model from blob.

* Preparing binary client requests.

* Cleanup connection management system.

* - Task system implemented.
- Cancellation support added.
- ExitLater + Snapshot updated.

* ExitLater entrypoint updated.

* - Moved JSON adapters to separated folder.
- Renamed message folder to json.

* Removed binary request support.

* - Added EnvironmentMap entrypoints.
- Updated notification system with rate limiter.
- Fixed bug with Poco serialization of inf and NaN.
- Added enum to image streaming mode.
- Fixed bug with enum serialization.
- Added real message for inspect entrypoint.

* PropertyMap adapter added.

* VideoStream entrypoint added.

* Add model entrypoint added.

* Remove model entrypoint added.

* Added type explicitely in JSON adapter.

* JsonAdapter improved + update-model implemented.

* GetModel entrypoint added.

* ModelProperties entrypoints added.

* ModelPropertiesSchema entrypoint added.

* RequestModelUpload entrypoint added.

* Binary model upload fully implemented.

* Model transfer function entrypoint added.

* Add and get clip plane entrypoints added.

* Update and remove clip plane entrypoints added.

* Get instances entrypoint added.

* Update instance entrypoint added.

* Get loaders entrypoint added.

* Loaders schema entrypoint added.

* Camera params entrypoint added.

* - Added missing conversion in PropertyMap.
- Delayed entrypoint setup once all plugins are loaded.
- Renderer params entrypoint added.

* Get lights entrypoint added.

* Add light entrypoint added.

* Remove lights entrypoint added.

* Clear lights entrypoint added.

* Image streaming preparation.

* Minor improvements.

* Material entrypoints added.

* Materials entrypoints added.

* Get material ids entrypoint added.

* Json improvements.

* Set material extra attributes entrypoint added.

* Set synapses attributes entrypoint added.

* Save model to cache entrypoint added.

* Set connections per value entrypoint added.

* Set metaballs per simulation value entrypoint.

* Odu camera entrypoints added.

* Attach cell growth handler entrypoint added.
+ fixed crash when connection closed during image broadcast.

* Attach circuit simulation handler added.

* Export frames to disk entrypoint added.

* Get export frames progress entrypoint added.

* Make movie entrypoint added.

* Trace anterograde entrypoint added.
Material entrypoints refactored.

* Add grid entrypoint added.

* Add column entrypoint added.

* Add sphere entrypoint added.

* Add pill entrypoint added.

* Add cylinder entrypoint added.

* Add box entrypoint added.

* Remap circuit color entrypoint added.

* Color cells entrypoint added.

* Mirror model entrypoint added.

* Set circuit thickness entrypoint added.

* Add streamlines entrypoint added
Fixed build errors in DTI plugin

* Set spike simulation entrypoint added.

* Set spike simulation from file added.

* CI info entrypoint added.

* Fixing build errors if Poco not installed.
Removed d postfix in shared libraries.
Added network linkage in plugins.

* CI get cell data entrypoint added.

* CI get cell ids entrypoint added.

* CI get cell ids from model entrypoint added.

* CI get reports entrypoint added.

* CI get report info entrypoint added.

* CI get targets entrypoint added.
CI get spike report info entrypoint added.

* CI get afferent cell ids entrypoint added.

* CI get efferent cell ids entrypoint added.

* CI get projection efferent cell ids added.
CI get projections entrypoint added.

* CircuitInfo cleanup.

* DTI and CircuitInfo cleanup.

* CircuitExplorer cleanup.

* Network cleanup and documentation.

* Removed rockets and dependencies.

* SSL support preparation.

* Client side preparation.

* Client side interface added.

* Added start method in ActionInterface.

* Fixed bug in client mode with SSL.

* Registry entrypoint added.

* - Error handling improved.
- Request ID can now be integer or null.
- Added null schema.

* Error handling improved.

* Params can be omitted if empty.

* Updated add-clip-plane with object as params.

* Set material message is now an object.

* Json validation errors are now string list.

* Close all sockets at shutdown.

* Removed unused code.

* New update loop system implemented.

* Remove UV and UVW.

* Circuit explorer enum names adaptation.

* First version of Python client (not fully tested).

* Removed useless components from Poco build.

* Fixed build warnings.

* Ignoring Poco warnings.

* Removed useless tracks of network disable option.

* Removed Rockets from Python.

* Added license files in python.

* Fixed build warnings.

* Removed tracks of UVW.

* Fixed build warnings.

* Fixed warnings and added documentation.

* Fixed build warning.

* Removed Poco warnings.

* Enable Poco warnings in debug mode.

* Python client refactoring.

* Fixed data race in python client.

* Fixed socket timeout and max size.

* Improved error handling in frame export.

* Documentation of Python client.
+ Context manager added to brayns.Client.

* Network task documentation.

* Tasks documentation.

* Network tasks documentation.

* Binary upload documentation.

* Network common documentation.

* Network context documentation.

* Entrypoint base documentation.

* JSON documentation.

* Check for object update on each update.

* JSON schema documentation.

* JSON documentation.

* Connection system documentation.

* Stream documentation.

* Network parameters documentation.

* Examples added.

* Improved notification handling.

* Fixed build error and more logs added.

* Improved Python documentation.

* Minor update of Python client.

* Python package setup (unstable).

* Fixed Python testing errors.

* Fixed ressource issues in Python tests.

* Fixed Python secure connection test.

* Improved entrypoint Python testing.

* Python package setup.

* Fixed Python installation errors.

* Improved Python API model.

* Fixed issue in Python fucntion params generation.

* Fixed typing issues in Python client.

* Updated label for list and dict in Python client.

* Added version.py and fixed label spelling.

* Python documentation generation improved.

* Fixed some Python doc issues.

* Generated and updated Python doc.

* Fixed Python tests issues.

* Fixed build error.

* Fixed build error.

* Updated dockerfile.

* CLang format for brayns.

* CLang format plugins.

* Empty encoder.cpp added for CI.

* CLang formatting.

* clang format tests.

* clang format cleanup.

* Format with clang-format-9.

* Format with clang-format-9.

* clang-format-9 retry

* Test

* Formatting PlyParser.h

* Test

* clang-format-9.

* clang-format-9

* clang-format

* Test

* Test

* Format with clang 6.0.

* clang-format 6.0

* Encoding update.

* Fixed VRPN and OpenDeck plugins.

* Removed video stream.

* Removed boost::po from OpenDeck.

* Fixed link error on OpenDeck and VRPN.

* Disabled unused plugins in CMake.

* Fixed licenses date.

* Added missing author.

* License format.

* Replace #ifndef by #pragma once.

* Added missing doc.

* Fixed license in python.

* Set author to BBP in python setup.

* Adding Adrien Fleury in acknowledgments.

* Fixed clang format.

Co-authored-by: Nadir Román Guerrero <nadir.ro.gue@gmail.com>
